Unicron:
 "Of course that he's part of this"replied cooly the male"Now, my 
sweet lady, we should go to bussines... where's Malice? Just tell me 
what I like to know and don't tell me lies or.."
 
 Unicron did a significan look to Nightstrike and his blaster did a 
small noyse... that meanse that the las lock was out and the weapon 
was ready to shot
Organics:  "I don't know, we have no seen him.  But I can find him 
with my sensors.  His energy signature is hard to miss."
Unicron:  "GOOOD..."Said the male"Then... I culd spare your life and 
your sweetbot's too... with a deal"
Organics/ Injustice:  "Deal?" the clone and Organics repeat.  It 
sounded weird, but he was the boss after all.
Unicron: "You two could join my army, and serve me... But you have 
to told me where Malice is with those treacherus femme"said 
Unicron"Your borther will be my Prisioner..."
Organics:  "I guess I have no choice.  I will serve."
Unicron: "Good"said the male"Take this male to Cr chamber... I warn 
you miss,... What's your name?"
Organics:  "My name, is Organics."
Unicron: "I warn you, Miss Organics... I'll keep your boyfriend as 
my guest. and YOu will be closely watched... One signal of betrayal 
and your boyfriend will be executed, first, in front your eyes and 
you will be executed later a strong suffering, Understand? "
Organics:  The femme growled a little.  "I understand."
Unicron: "Good... Now that you said that could find Malice... That 
will be your work, you will have to find him using my computers 
after you rest a while. Nightstrike will you the lab and quarters; I 
have not to mention that some areas are out your reaching, by now... 
Any question?"
Organics:  "None.  I want to get this over with.  I don't need any 
lab right now, just le me go find him."
Unicron: "I'm afriad that I can't let you go to searh him"replied 
Unicron"And using the lab and the computers there would be the only 
way to do this work"
